posts.post_content: In the right deck, devastating. If played carefully, it could win you entire games. Just don't pay ![4](/Handlers/Image.ashx?size=small&name=4&type=symbol) for anything!

posts.post_content:
Remember: **It only counts Spirit and Arcane spells!** Also, don't forget the Changelings... and even better, the Changeling Spells. They count as Spirits. :)  
  
There are three ways to destroy lands (and all other permanents with 0 CC) with it:  
1) Cast [Evermind](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Evermind). (Use [Isochron Scepter](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Isochron Scepter), [Kaho, Minamo Historian](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Kaho, Minamo Historian), cascade, etc. to get around the non-existent CC.)  
2) Turn a 0-CC creature *(i.e. [Ornithopter](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Ornithopter), [Memnite](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Memnite), [Phyrexian Walker](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Phyrexian Walker), [Shield Sphere](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Shield Sphere), Kobolds...; or [Phyrexian Marauder](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Phyrexian Marauder), or [Shifting Wall](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Shifting Wall) cast with X=0)* into Spirit for when you cast it. Only way of turning creature spells into Spirits *before you cast them* that I know if is [Conspiracy](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Conspiracy). You **can't** target them with [Amoeboid Changeling](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Amoeboid Changeling), for example, because they aren't in play.  
3) Change ... [(see all)](javascript:void(0);)
posts.html:
Remember: It only counts Spirit and Arcane spells! Also, don't forget the Changelings... and even better, the Changeling Spells. They count as Spirits. :)

There are three ways to destroy lands (and all other permanents with 0 CC) with it:
1) Cast Evermind. (Use Isochron Scepter, Kaho, Minamo Historian, cascade, etc. to get around the non-existent CC.)
2) Turn a 0-CC creature (i.e. Ornithopter, Memnite, Phyrexian Walker, Shield Sphere, Kobolds...; or Phyrexian Marauder, or Shifting Wall cast with X=0) into Spirit for when you cast it. Only way of turning creature spells into Spirits before you cast them that I know if is Conspiracy. You can't target them with Amoeboid Changeling, for example, because they aren't in play.
3) Change ... (see all)
